mapper.select: select ROWNUM, bono, mno, mname, bocontents, botitle, bohits, recnt, IF(DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%Y.%m.%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%H:%i') ) as bodate, bostatus from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, B.* FROM (select b.bono bono, b.mno mno, m.mname mname, b.bocontents bocontents, b.botitle botitle, b.bohits bohits, (select count(*) from reply where bono = b.bono) as recnt, b.bodate bodate, b.bostatus bostatus, b.botype botype from board as b inner join member as m on b.mno = m.mno where botype= 1 order by bodate desc) B, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0 ) TMP) C where ROWNUM <= #{endNo} and ROWNUM >= #{startNo}

select b.bono bono, b.mno mno, m.mname mname, b.bocontents bocontents, b.botitle botitle, b.bodate bodate, b.bohits bohits, b.fno fno, b.bostatus bostatus from board as b inner join member as m on b.mno = m.mno where b.bono = #{bono}
mapper.update: update board set bohits=bohits+1 where bono = #{bono}
